Utterance: Hi there! It’s great to see you again. How did your week go?
Hi, Ellie! It was good. I actually had that conversation with my manager, and it went better than I expected!
That’s fantastic! What happened?
I explained how I was feeling overwhelmed, and they were really understanding. We talked about adjusting some deadlines and prioritizing my tasks.
That’s an excellent outcome! How did that make you feel?
I felt relieved and supported. It was nice to know they care about my well-being.
That’s wonderful to hear! It sounds like you took a significant step in managing your anxiety. Have you noticed any changes in your stress levels since then?
Yes, I feel less stressed overall. I’ve been able to focus better on my work.
That’s great progress! Have you kept up with your meditation practice as well?
Yes, I’ve been meditating daily. It really helps me stay calm and focused.
That’s a fantastic habit to maintain. Have you tried any new techniques or approaches in your meditation?
I’ve started incorporating guided meditations, which help me stay focused.
That’s a great idea! Guided meditations can provide structure and help deepen your practice. How do you feel during and after those sessions?
I feel more centered during the session, and afterwards, I’m more relaxed and ready to tackle my day.
That’s wonderful! It sounds like you’re really finding what works for you. Is there anything else you’d like to explore today?
I’d like to discuss my social life a bit. I’ve been feeling a little isolated lately.
Of course! Can you tell me more about why you feel that way?
I think it’s just been busy with work, and I haven’t made time to see friends. I miss hanging out with them.
It’s easy to let work take over our social lives. What do you think is preventing you from reaching out to them?
I guess I have this fear that they’ll be too busy or that I won’t have anything interesting to say.
It’s common to feel that way, but remember, friends often appreciate the effort to connect. How do you think they would respond if you reached out?
I think they’d be happy to hear from me. They’re usually understanding.
That’s a positive mindset! Would you like to set a goal for reaching out to a friend this week?
Yes, I’d like to invite a friend to grab coffee or lunch.
That sounds like a great plan! Which friend do you have in mind?
I think I’ll reach out to my friend Sarah. We used to hang out a lot.
Excellent choice! How do you feel about reaching out to her?
I’m a bit nervous but also excited. I really miss our time together.
That’s completely normal. Maybe you could start with a simple text or call to catch up. How does that sound?
That sounds doable. I’ll try to do it later today.
Perfect! Remember, it’s about reconnecting and enjoying each other’s company. Is there anything else you’d like to discuss today?
No, I think we covered a lot. I feel good about my goals for the week.
I’m glad to hear that! I look forward to hearing how your coffee date goes next time. Take care, and remember to keep practicing your meditation!
Thank you, Ellie! I will. See you next time!
See you!
